message_text: Congratulations on reaching our final set of tips! üéâ Here we are talking about ways to build your and your children‚Äôs strength and to encourage good behaviours in them.

Here are 2Ô∏è‚É£ simple tips that can help you to encourage your children to build strength:

1Ô∏è‚É£ *INVOLVE YOUR CHILDREN*

Ask children to help in simple chores üí™. This will give them a sense of responsibility.

2Ô∏è‚É£ *PRAISE THEM*
üíôAppreciate children when they are trying or doing something good.

This will help them to do good again.

üåü Praising children shows them that you notice and care, and helps build confidence.

You can also build your own strength üí™ by remembering that you are not alone. 
Sharing your sorrow and worries with someone you trust often helps lighten the burden ü§ù. 

If your sorrow and worries feel overwhelming, please contact a trusted person, organisation or helpline. Type HELP after these tips for more information.

Thank you for being here with us today and for all our tips üíô. You are doing so much to care for yourself and your children.
